nodes.text: The Haven was a secret hideout built by Kanan Jarrus' rebel cell on the Outer Rim planet of Lothal, some five years before the Battle of Yavin. As its name implied, the hideout was designed as a haven for defenseless citizens who were targeted by the Galactic Empire. Some of its inhabitants were Keri Belab, Lorvo Derigo, Jimnaj, Angmi Lihosh, Ossin Nandar, Rance Lojo, Rodd Nertu, Dorthu Santim, Nuj Sorwin, Lornto Teswam, Rylou Watmill, an Ugnaught droid maker and a chef.

The location featured a landing pad for the Ghost. Similar to other resistance establishments throughout the galaxy, it functioned mainly as a hideout, and its loss would not significantly affect operations.
Haven appears in the mobile video game Star Wars Rebels: Recon Missions.
